description.raw:
The `ign-physics` and `ign-sensors` now have gz11 features in their default branches, which is causing their default branch builds to fail in jenkins:

* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_physics-ci-default-bionic-amd64&build=11)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-ci-default-bionic-amd64/11/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-ci-default-bionic-amd64/11/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_sensors-ci-default-bionic-amd64&build=11)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-bionic-amd64/11/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-bionic-amd64/11/

This branch will hopefully fix that by changing the logic in `_gz11_hook.bash` a bit and declaring `NEEDS_GZ11_SUPPORT=true` in the physics and sensors build scripts.

Testing:

* ~~[![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_physics-ci-default-bionic-amd64&build=13)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-ci-default-bionic-amd64/13/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-ci-default-bionic-amd64/13/~~
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_physics-ci-default-bionic-amd64&build=14)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-ci-default-bionic-amd64/14/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-ci-default-bionic-amd64/14/
* [![Build Status](https://build.osrfoundation.org/buildStatus/icon?job=ignition_sensors-ci-default-bionic-amd64&build=14)](https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-bionic-amd64/14/) https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-bionic-amd64/14/

I have some additional ideas for follow-up PR's to improve gz11 detection for the `-any-` builds and to regularly test the gz11 branches like release branches; but I'll save that for later.
description.html:
The ign-physics and ign-sensors now have gz11 features in their default branches, which is causing their default branch builds to fail in jenkins:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-ci-default-bionic-amd64/11/
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-bionic-amd64/11/

This branch will hopefully fix that by changing the logic in _gz11_hook.bash a bit and declaring NEEDS_GZ11_SUPPORT=true in the physics and sensors build scripts.

Testing:

  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-ci-default-bionic-amd64/13/
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_physics-ci-default-bionic-amd64/14/
  • https://build.osrfoundation.org/job/ignition_sensors-ci-default-bionic-amd64/14/

I have some additional ideas for follow-up PR's to improve gz11 detection for the -any- builds and to regularly test the gz11 branches like release branches; but I'll save that for later.

title.raw: support gz11 on default branches for ign-physics/sensors
